FuncDef: The reset multicast remote-backup igmp statistics command resets statistics about IGMP messages in remote backup profile (RBP) buffers.
CLIs: reset multicast remote-backup igmp statistics slot <slot-id>
reset multicast remote-backup igmp statistics interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> }

ParaDef.Info:
Resets statistics about IGMP messages in the RBP buffer on a specified interface type.
-

Resets statistics about IGMP messages in the RBP buffer on a specified interface name.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Resets statistics about IGMP messages in all RBP buffers on a specified board.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset multicast remote-backup igmp statistics interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To reset statistics about IGMP messages in the RBP buffers, run the reset multicast remote-backup igmp statistics command.
